text: Located at 2nd floor. Selling all muslimin / muslimat item. Haj apparel. Surprising... there are cubicles musollah . Also have u want to take wudhu'. But pls consider others , dont take too many time to pray

Best! Always hv many choices for frozen/processed food. I love how they're also selling mini hejab at entrance too!

Only drawback is the price keep escalating if I keep buying in bulk! :(

If wrong size, cannot exchange.. staff said its the law. REALLY?!! Insist customer should should confirm sizes before paying.. Joo chiat complex store for wedding stuffs... staff not helpful and lacks empathy and manners.. please reflect!

Had a bad experience with the staff where the group of staff laughed at me. Wanted to buy bunga paha and clarified with Staff A (the day before I bought) if eggs would be provided and the staff said yes. Came back the next day, another staff B served me and she said no, the eggs would not be provided (even though I told her multiple times Staff A said eggs would be provided). Went back to the cashier to talk about it and laugh. Kakak kakak kerja kat situ lain kali tak payah pakai tudung kalau nak ketawakan orang macam sial.

Adding review on behalf of my mother who was very rudely treated. She had merely asked, 'Serunding pondok abang dah takde jual lagi eh?'.

The reply given by the woman who works there was, 'Sejak bila eh kita ada jual serunding tu? Masa covid ke? Mana ada eh?'.

The customer before my mom was also similarly replied to.

Perhaps she is having a bad day. But even if they had never sold a certain product, surely there is a better way to reply instead of the sarcasm-filled reply given.
